bibl.title: The Inventory of an Egyptian Church on a Greek Papyrus.

series.title: Publications de l'Institut Orientaliste de Louvain.

bibl.note: The Leiden papyrus sheds new light on the movable property (books, silver, gold, linen, silk) of an Egyptian church at an early date (VIIth or VIIIth cent.).

bibl.title: Actes du IVe Congrès copte, Louvain-la-Neuve, 5-10 septembre 1988. I

bibl.seg: VAN MINNEN Peter, The Inventory of an Egyptian Church on a Greek Papyrus.
Actes du IVe Congrès copte, Louvain-la-Neuve, 5-10 septembre 1988. I = Publications de l'Institut Orientaliste de Louvain. 40 (Louvain-la-Neuve, 1992) pp. 227-233, 2 tabl.
The Leiden papyrus sheds new light on the movable property (books, silver, gold, linen, silk) of an Egyptian church at an early date (VIIth or VIIIth cent.).
